channel.title: [HELP] A 'Strange' Lag
channel.description:
Ok so whenever I go on my server. This is a FORM of lag but i wouldn't class it as Lag?
Nobody online except me. No NPCS around. Any Animate Objects (Moving Objects) Are seriously fucked up. For Example: Any Moving Objects move for half a second then pause for half a second, then move for half a second and then pause for half a second repeatedly. May I add I am using Skatersscape source.
But I am currently removing shit-loads of malware which just magic-ed itself onto my pc :|
So, I was wondering if there are any fixes to this? Thank-you.
++REP For ALL Helpful answers.

item.title: [HELP] A 'Strange' Lag
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:36, topic:328946”][quote author=Kayceee link=topic=425333.msg3123880#msg3123880 date=1265835741]
Ok so that Malware has TOTALLED & I Mean Totalled My Laptop. It won’t load past the Windows XP Splash Screen in any mode.
Perhaps I shouldn’t have rebooted.
So anyway… I’m currently downloading Slax, will bang it on a Memory stick, Backup a few things onto my Mac and give my Laptop a well-earned FULL Restore. (I might even consider Windows 7)
Not sure yet.
[/quote]

Windows 7 works like a charm. Been using it for months myself (since the RC release), haven’t had a single crash or anything :)[/quote]

In that case I’ll definately give it a go.

Read full topic

Good luck with the malware removal

item.title: [HELP] A 'Strange' Lag
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Alright so now my Java isnt working properly cause of the Malware I had, most of it removed but still some traces, in the mean time of my Malware Removal…
I noticed something else?
I have used a Java File searcher (used both lowercase and uppercase in my searches)
But when I double click on my run.bat
It shows “SkatersScape V1” In the Dialogue box (Not the title)
[On the black background in white writing].

Even though I’ve replaced EVERYTHING that said SkatersScape with GreaterScape.

Thank you so much to everyone so far once again.
Hopefully I will be malware free soon and will be able to test if my Server is Lag-free.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] A 'Strange' Lag
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

[quote=“Kayceee, post:21, topic:328946”]Tried using a lowercase e but got the same error.
And I dont have an EventManager file in my source so now I feel an idiot

Hmm. I’ve never seen that piece of code, my process doesn’t even have it
Try commenting it out, by putting // infront of it.
It probably does nothing, as you didn’t have it before.

No problem
And let’s hope so. I’ll be waiting just in case

Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Press any key to continue . . .

Success!
Thanks, now lets see if anything happened in-game :o[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] A 'Strange' Lag
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

I knew that
Thanks

Alright, so I fixed them now, But am still getting 1 error.

process.java:39: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable EventManager
location: class process
EventManager.getSingleton().shutdown();
^
Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Thank you so much to everybody who has posted a reply so far and Thanks even more to the consistant helpers.

EDIT:
AH, Thank you Pali, I’m guessing now that my final error means that the EventManager doesn’t match with the name of my EventManager.java
So it should be changed to eventManager?
or something along those lines? If Im right ill be so happy because Im almost learning to read from compilers what I’ve done wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] A 'Strange' Lag
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Very. I think it was a bad idea to change ALL the servers.
Some methods (killServer etc) use capitals in the method name.
There lies your problem. process.java now searches for methods that aren’t there.

Change the updateserver, killserver and shutdownserver into

updateServer killServer and shutdownServer

Good luck

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] A 'Strange' Lag
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

[quote=“Kayceee, post:13, topic:328946”]Oh, I was supposed to make all Process into process aswell? I thought I only had to do server’s. My bad. Thanks

Hmm strange
I did CTRL + H
And replaced all Server with server
And all Process with process and still get

process.java:10: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable shutdownserver
location: class server
while (!server.shutdownserver) {
^
process.java:12: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable updateserver
location: class server
if (server.updateserver)
^
process.java:33: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable shutdownserver
location: class server
server.shutdownserver = true;
^
process.java:39: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable EventManager
location: class process
EventManager.getSingleton().shutdown();
^
process.java:41: cannot find symbol
symbol : method killserver()
location: class server
server.clientHandler.killserver();
^
Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
5 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

It is because you replaced the shutdownserver part to… lol

it should be like

server.shutdownServer

try this

[code]
public class Process extends Thread {
public static int cycleTime = 500;

    @Override
    public void run() {
            int waitFails = 0;
            long lastTicks = System.currentTimeMillis();
            long totalTimeSpentProcessing = 0;
            int cycle = 0;
            while (!server.shutdownServer) {
                    try {
                            if (server.updateServer)
                                    server.calcTime();
                            server.playerHandler.process();
                            server.npcHandler.process();
                            server.itemHandler.process();
                            server.shopHandler.process();
                            long timeSpent = System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTicks;
                            totalTimeSpentProcessing += timeSpent;
                            if (timeSpent >= cycleTime) {
                                    timeSpent = cycleTime;
                            }
                            try {
                                    Thread.sleep(cycleTime - timeSpent);
                            } catch (java.lang.Exception _ex) { }
                            lastTicks = System.currentTimeMillis();
                            cycle++;
                            if (cycle % 100 == 0) {
                                    float time = ((float) totalTimeSpentProcessing) / cycle;
                            }
                            if (server.ShutDown) {
                                    if (server.ShutDownCounter >= 100) {
                                            server.shutdownServer = true;
                                    }
                                    server.ShutDownCounter++;
                            }
                    } catch (Exception e) { }
            }
            EventManager.getSingleton().shutdown();
            server.playerHandler.destruct();
            server.clientHandler.killServer();
            server.clientHandler = null;
    }

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] A 'Strange' Lag
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Kayceee:

Oh, I was supposed to make all Process into process aswell? I thought I only had to do server’s. My bad. Thanks

Nope 

public class [b]Process[/b]

The bold word has too be the same as the file name, if not, it causes a conflict like you experienced

Read full topic
